body.name: Shinco Handheld Wired Microphone, Cardioid Dynamic Vocal Mic with 13ft Cable and ON/Off Switch, Ideally Suited for Speakers, Karaoke Singing Machine, Amp, Mixer
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 27 mins
features: Premium Sound Quality - This Shinco handheld dynamic microphones offers cardioid pickup pattern, capturing your own output and filter out dozens of unwanted sounds, it is perfect for anyone that wants to record or perform live either indoor or outdoors.

Rugged and Comfortable - Made of environmentally friendly materials, this handheld microphone is solid,rugged and durable. It feels comfortable when you grap it in your hand. You will be glad to move freely as the attached cable is around 13ft long, no need to worry the loose of the connector or the length of the cable.

Easy to Operate - No battery required for operation,you can set up yourself in minutes. An external on/off switch on it for easy control of audio (Push up is ON, push down is OFF). When the microphone is not used, you can turn it OFF using the switch without unplugging the cable.

Robust Compatibility - This handheld wired microphones comes with a 1/4 inch jack, as well as a 1/4" to 1/8" TS connector for fitting more devices. Fully supports various devices which has 1/4" or 1/8" Mic input, such as DVD, television, KTV audio, reverberator, mixer, tour bus, etc.

Suitable for Many Scenarios - The dynamic cardioid microphone picks up sounds and reduce all background noise effectively, it will reproduce them faithfully. Great for professional KTV, stage performance, business meeting, public speaking, family or friend party, outdoor performances, etc. Suitable for either the beginners or the professional users.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Handheld dynamic microphone Handheld dynamic microphone with rugged grille and optimized frequency response, providing uncompromising vocal reproduction. Microphone with 13ft cable 13ft strong cable for a large moving range, no distraction from the limited wire length anymore. Great for performance Smooth, extended frequency response, ideal for stage performance, public speaking, podcasting, professional karaoke, family or friends party

Easy to operate No battery required for operation, an external on/off switch on it for easy control of audio (Push up is ON, push down is OFF). Plug and play This handheld microphone is plug and play. it comes with a 1/4 inch jack, as well as a 1/4" to 1/8" TS connector for fitting more devices. Excellent frequency response Low-mass diaphragm provides excellent frequency response

Reduce unwanted noise Cardioid polar pattern reduces pickup of unwanted sounds from the sides and rear, improving isolation of desired sound source Trusted Sound quality Wonderful vocal microphone that will be sure to only capture the crisp sound of your voice and instruments without any disturbances interfering from other electronic devices. Robust compatibility Fully supports various devices which has 1/4" or 1/8" Mic input, such as portable speaker, audio mixer, amplifier and karaoke machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: I'm new to amplification. I wasn't sure if this would work with my little amplifier, but I just plugged it in and it works perfectly. This with a mic stand is all I need for the few performances I do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great mic for the price if you add a wind filter "foam" it actually is rather impressive quality for the price... Does have some echo...... The permanent none detachable cord is the only short coming of this device although you can never forget an XLR cord so it's a con and a plus. Connected direct to machine mk3 no hassle. Easy to use just flip the switch and your ready to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cheap but good quality. Very impressed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sounds good. We use it for karaoke and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good choice. Come with plug to PC too
reviews.reviewText: It works fine with the best price( it works better if closer to mouth). And it comes with the 1/8" jack that you can sing it on PC too. 5/5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works, but not well.
reviews.reviewText: The price was pretty low, so I knew I would be getting what I paid for.The construction is solid, it looks nice, but the audio volume that comes from it is weak.I connected it to a personal PA speaker (designed for this purpose), and even at the speakers full volume, the mic is no louder than regular speech level. No feedback could be produced.But when I connected another mic I got immediate feedback, which of course meant a higher mic volume produced.It can work great as a toy, or for younger children so they can't annoy their parents very much. But don't expect much (volume) from this low priced mic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Quality microphone works great for a great price. Perfect for karaoke night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The cable is not detachable
reviews.reviewText: It’s a standard quality dynamic microphone, suitable for live speaking or singing. I have yet to try it on an instrument, but that’s not really what this product is for. Noteworthy- the cable is simply attached to the base of the microphone, and terminates with a 1/4” plug. This is not standard for the sm-58 this product is styled after. I guess that means you won’t lose it, but that also means if the cable is damaged, the microphone is useless.
